entry.question:
**Karnaparva 36.1 a-b** *कन्यायां नैव तु पुनर्मम तुल्यावुभौ मतौ*
Who is the speaker in this verse?
A) Yudhiṣṭhira B) Bhīma C) Kunti D) Draupadi
entry.answer: C) Kunti • The verse is spoken by Kunti, as indicated by the context of maternal sacrifice. • Yudhiṣṭhira and Bhīma are not the speakers in this context. • Draupadi is not mentioned in this specific verse.

entry.question:
**Karnaparva 37.1 a-b** *अपापां तामहं बालां कथमुत्स्रष्टुमुत्सहे*
Who is the speaker referring to as "tām" (her)?
A) Kunti B) Draupadi C) Gandhari D) Karna
entry.answer: B) Draupadi • The speaker is Kunti, lamenting her daughter Draupadi. • Gandhari and Karna are not the focus here. • Kunti's own daughter is Draupadi.

entry.question:
**Karnaparva 38.1 a-b** *आत्मानमपि चोत्सृज्य तप्स्ये प्रेतवशं गतः*
Who is described as "prētavaśaṃ gataḥ" (bound by fate)?
A) Bhīma B) Drona C) Kunti D) Yudhiṣṭhira
entry.answer: C) Kunti • Kunti laments her fate in this verse. • Drona and Yudhiṣṭhira are not the subject here. • Bhīma's fate is not the focus of this line.

entry.question:

entry.question:
**Karnaparva 40.2 a-b** *सर्वैः सह मृतं श्रेयो न तु मे जीवितं क्षमम्*

entry.question:
